code: import s from'./TodaySection.module.css';import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{dayConverter,weekDayConverter,monthFullConverter,yearSeasonConverter}from'../../../helpers/dateConverter';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TodaySection=()=>{let[date,setDate]=useState({day:'',month:'',dayWeekk:''});useEffect(()=>{let date=new Date();let day=date.getDate();let month=date.getMonth()+1;let dayWeekk=date.getDay();setDate({day:dayConverter(day),month:monthFullConverter(month),dayWeekk:weekDayConverter(dayWeekk),img:yearSeasonConverter(month)});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`${s.today_section} section-container`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:s.bg_img,src:date.img,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.today_content,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u0421\u044C\u043E\u0433\u043E\u0434\u043D\u0456"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[date.day," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:date.dayWeekk}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),date.month]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u0410\u043A\u0442\u0443\u0430\u043B\u044C\u043D\u0435 \u043D\u0438\u0436\u0447\u0435"})]})]});};export default TodaySection;
